column8: june 15. funeral mass will be held at 11:30 a. m. on thursday
column11: at our lady of the caves catholic church. a tribute to john will be held at 10:00 a. m. prior to the funeral mass at winn funeral home. burial will follow in the horse cave municipal cemetery. visitation at winn funeral home on wednesday from 2-8 p. m. and on thursday from 8-10 a. m. until time of the tribute.
